title: An Iconic Image That Captured A Legendary Knockout
teaser: Monday marks the 50th anniversary of the heavyweight boxing title rematch in Maine between Muhammad Ali and Sonny Liston. Ali, then 23, knocked Liston out in the first round. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Sports Illustrated photographer Neil Leifer, who captured the moment afterward when Ali towered over Liston.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
